sense.gloss: attempting two tasks at the same time, accomplishing neither, falling between two stools, catching neither the horsefly nor the bee
robber fly (any fly of family Asilidae)
bee fly (any insect of family Bombyliidae)
soldier fly (any fly of family Stratiomyidae, esp. species Stratiomys japonica)
horsefly and bee, horsefly and wasp
x: 虻蜂取らず・あぶはちとらず

sdata.j: そんなに↑欲↑↓よく↓をかいていると、↑虻↑↓あぶ↓↑蜂↑↓はち↓↑取↑↓と↓らずになっちゃうよ。
sdata.e: Don't be so greedy or you'll wind up with nothing.

sdata.j: その↑提案↑↓ていあん↓↑一石二鳥↑↓いっせきにちょう↓を↑狙↑↓ねら↓ったものだろうけど、「↑虻↑↓あぶ↓↑蜂↑↓はち↓とらず」にならなければいいけどね。
sdata.e: That proposal may be a way to kill two birds with one stone, but we also have to be careful not to get greedy and spoil everything.

sdata.j: ↑結局↑↓けっきょく↓は↑虻↑↓あぶ↓↑蜂↑↓はち↓とらずになってしまった。
sdata.e: If you try for too much, you'll end up with nothing at all.

sdata.j: ↑見↑↓み↓たこともないような↑数↑↓かず↓の↑虻↑↓あぶ↓が、↑私↑↓わたし↓にまとわりついてきたのです。
sdata.e: More horseflies than I'd ever seen came and flew around me.
